name: Get ready in the morning
description: By the end of morning time get your teeth brushed for more than a minute and get dressed for the day.  You only get points if mama and papa only have to remind you once!

name: Get ready for bed
description: Before going to be brush your teeth, put jammies on and get in bed. You only get points if mama and papa only have to remind you once!

name: Clean up your room
description: When you get out of bed or before we leave for the day, make your bed and pick up your room.  It doesn't have to be perfect, but its get that good clean feeling and no legos to step on.

name: Practice your instrument
description: Do a 15 minutes practice on your perfect instrument for a perfect practice

name: Weekly Music Lesson
description: Once a week you have practice with your teacher.  Get ready by yourself before the lesson starts and have a great lesson.

name: Plan meals for the week and buy groceries
description: Someone that get the weekly plan together, for groceries and awesome meals

name: Fold laundry and put aways clothes
description: Do a load of laundry from wash, to folding, to putting away

name: Cook Dinner
description: Cook the most delicious dinner ever!

name: Set the table
description: Before dinner starts clean of the table and set it up for dinner

name: Clean up the kitchen after dinner
description: Clear the table, clean all the dishes, fill dishwasher, and give the kitchen a wipe down
